message.name: ERR_HBI_XFV_CLIENT_MAX_AMT_COMP_GREATER
message.locale: The entered maximum amount cannot be greater than %1n, the value of the selected component.

message.name: ERR_UTILIITYPAYMENT_FV_NO_DEDUCTIONS_ALLOWED
message.locale: There are no components for which deductions can be made for utility payments for this Case

message.name: ERR_UTILIITYPAYMENT_XRV_EXISTING_RECORD
message.locale: A utility payment has already been set up between this client and utility company.

message.name: ERR_UTILITY_RNFE_TYPECODE
message.locale: Utility with corresponding type code "%1c" was not found.

message.name: ERR_CASEDECN_RNFE_FOR_ELIGIBILITY_CHECK
message.locale: No utility payments can be created for this case until the Check Eligibility function has been called.

message.name: ERR_CASEDECN_RNFE_FOR_CASE
message.locale: No case decision record found for this case.

message.name: ERR_UTILIITYPAYMENT_ADDED_FV_CLOSED_CASE
message.locale: A Utility Payment cannot be made from a case with a status of Closed.

message.name: ERR_UTILITY_PAYMENT_FV_STATUS_CLOSED
message.locale: The utility payment cannot be closed as it has been closed already.

message.name: ERR_UTILITY_PAYMENT_ITEM_FV_PAID
message.locale: The record cannot be closed as utility payments have already been made in respect of this deduction item. To prevent further deductions from being made, the end date can be modified. The earliest date that the end can be set to is '%1d'.
